entries.content: Fixed markdown rendering bug caused by HtmlEscaper converting backticks to HTML entities, preventing code block regex patterns from matching. Changed escape() to only escape HTML-dangerous chars (&, <, >, ", ') while preserving markdown syntax chars (backticks, asterisks, brackets, hashes).

UNRESOLVED: Markdown rendering bug persists after HtmlEscaper fix. User still sees raw text blocks. Need to debug with browser DevTools console next time - verify MarkdownFormatter.toHtml() is called, check Prism.js loads, verify innerHTML insertion, test regex patterns in isolation. Multiple MarkdownFormatter instances exist - need to identify which one is active.
